definition[0]: if you can’t face something, you feel unable to do it because it seems too unpleasant or difficult
example[0]: I don’t want to go back to college – I just can’t face it.
example[1]: I can’t face the thought of going into town when it’s this hot.
example[2]: She couldn’t face the prospect of another divorce.
example[3]: He couldn’t face driving all the way to Los Angeles.
